name: Idle Idol (Gabriel Padinha)
description:
A k-pop themed Idle Game! 

Travel all across the world with your k-pop group, recruit new idols, release new songs and earn a lot of money! If that's not enough, well... You can always comeback to go further! 

Includes:

  • Many idols with different skills to assemble the best team
  • Many different places with their own upgrades to increase money received
  • Comeback material: Use your points to improve your skills so you can reach further in the game
  • Showtime: Available once in a while, use this to maximize your earnings! 
  • Active Skills: Use them strategically to reach new areas.
